pages.title: Centrifuge Overclocker
pages.text: You can use Centrifuge Overclocker to accelerate centrifuge. It needs energy and Electrode to work, better Electrode has higher speed boost.$(br)When you use multiple overclockers at the same time, the speed boosts are additive. That means two Netherite Electrodes(+400%) can make bees work x9(+800%) faster.

pages.title: Electrode
pages.text: There four tiers of electrodes, and you can find their boost in JEI/tooltip.$(br)Electrodes will always lose 1 durability at every work tick.
